# The `ThreadSafeModule` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> together with a shared <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> together with a shared <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a>.

Definition at line 77 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/threadsafemodule-h">ThreadSafeModule.h</a>.

## Public Constructors

### ThreadSafeModule() {#a5238e1d80536030a7ddd0a00e18c7371}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="llvm::orc::ThreadSafeModule::ThreadSafeModule ()"
  labels = {["default"]}>
Default construct a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule">ThreadSafeModule</a>.

This results in a null module and null context.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/threadsafemodule-h/#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/threadsafemodule-h">ThreadSafeModule.h</a>.

### ThreadSafeModule() {#a59b16a2ba2778523a92d88a10d000e9d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::orc::ThreadSafeModule::ThreadSafeModule (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &gt; M, std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &gt; Ctx)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Construct a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule">ThreadSafeModule</a> from a unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt; and a unique&#95;ptr&lt;LLVMContext&gt;.

This creates a new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a> from the given context.

## Public Member Functions

### consumingModuleDo() {#a0f1e21cac5addd85d48c5e4819d31df7}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename Func&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>decltype(auto) llvm::orc::ThreadSafeModule::consumingModuleDo (Func &amp;&amp; F)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Locks the associated <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a> and calls the given function, passing the contained std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt;.

The given function should consume the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/threadsafemodule-h/#l00150">150</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/threadsafemodule-h">ThreadSafeModule.h</a>.
